text: Carl Bernstein (born February 14, 1944 in Washington, D.C.) is an American investigative journalist and author. While working with Bob Woodward at The Washington Post, the two did the majority of the most important news reporting on the Watergate scandal. He was married to filmmaker Nora Ephron from 1976 until they divorced in 1980. ==Other websites== * Carl Bernstein official site * * Profile at Random House * Proffile at Simon and Schuster * Profile at The Washington Post * Watergate Papers Web Exhibition at the Harry Ransom Center at the University of Texas at Austin, with inventory Category:1944 births Category:Living people Category:Journalists from Washington, D.C.
